LIFE, LIMB, EYESIGHT
sections.PURPOSE: of this event is to certify all Squads during LFX conditions and set conditions for PLT-level
sections.TASKS:
. Decisive to this event is the completion of dry and blank fire. This is decisive because it will ensure Squads are prepared to advance to the live fire iteration. We assume tactical risk by using live ammunition. We will mitigate this risk through planning, rehearsals, range safeties, and proper wear of PPE.
Training Objectives Conduct a Squad Assault (07-SQD-D9515)
Conduct SBF (07-SQD-3000)
React to Direct Fire Contact While Dismounted (07-SQD-D9501)
sections.END STATE: Squads effectively plan and rehearse. Squads employ direct fire control principles and are prepared to execute collective training at higher echelons.
sections.EXECUTION:
. This phase begins with TRP CP established and ends with the Comanche TRP RTB. Key to this phase is the validation of SOPs and SQD RXLs, certification of SQD LFXs, communication between elements, and AARs.
Phase 4: Reconsolidation. This phase begins with the SP of C TRP and ends when all MWE is accounted for in TRP AO. Key to this phase is CL V dunnage, accountability of MWE, and initiating recovery. ​

Overview: Phase I, Infiltration
SQD Establishes ORP

Overview: Phase II, RTC
Squad bounds forward to 2-man ENY OP (Phase Line Red).
Squad Identifies 4 additional ENY targets.
Squad Leader establishes base of fire with Alpha Team, engaging between TRPs 1 and 3.
Squad Leader executes Battle 2A and determines to flank right with Bravo Team.
N
SEQUENCE
RED
N
Overview: Phase III, Maneuver
WHITE
Squad Leader and Bravo Team flank ENY positions to the right along Direction of Attack 1. When Bravo Team reaches Phase Line White, Squad Leader will call for a shift fire left to TRPs 1 and 2.
Alpha Team Leader will execute PACE plan to confirm shift fire.
Bravo Team will reach the LCC (Phase Line Blue) and establish a base of fire. Once base of fire is established, Squad Leader will call lift fire. Alpha Team Leader will use PACE plan to confirm lift fire. Bravo Team engages between TRPs 2 and 3.
Bravo Team clears forward to LOA.
RED

BLUE
LOA

Overview: Phase IV, Reconsolidate
LOA
Once Bravo Team establishes security at the LOA, Alpha Team clears south.
Alpha Team establishes security at their respective LOA.
Squad Leader received ACE reports from Team Leaders.
Squad Leader calls for EPW clearing.
Squad Leader calls for Aid and Litter.
Squad Leader calls up SITREP and postures Squad for follow on
